attributes.action: Increase pay or stop taxes to all frontline staff during Covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
When the world goes mad and you need help, who do we rely on Healthcare, Police and Firefighters! 
So who does the government minimise or freeze pay rises on and cut staffing to save money, yes our silent heroes. 
So whilst we yet again stand to make our country proud and do what we do best, please show us all whilst we put ourselves at risk for the rest of the world to stop this horrible virus and show us some appreciation. But to include supermarket staff and bin men that are keeping us going.
attributes.background: For all staff members that are on the frontline during this scary time, that don’t have the choice to work at home. Show your appreciation by an increase in pay or stop the tax off their wages until it is all over.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
